name: Hand Doctor For Kid
description:
Hey little friend do you want to become a hand doctor?
Wearing stethoscope and looking professional?
Then this kid’s hand doctor game is a perfect design for you.
Kids are going to have an ultimate fun yet a learning experience, It’s the best only kids mac hand game among all the doctor games for kids!
Hurry up get it now it's totally FRE!!!

Features:
- Easy click and drag to play
- Six different little characters
- Kids friendly content
- Cool BG music and HD graphics
- Suitable for the whole family
- Apply plaster on stitches
- Use x-ray to fix the broken bone
